section.title: How to reset the password for #1
section.paragraph: You can only use one of these options at a time. Make sure to change back your nerhost.conf after making the changes.

section.title: Method 1
section.paragraph: in your netrhost.conf file add: newpass_god 777
This will reset #1’s password to the default ‘Nyctasia’.

section.title: Method 2
section.paragraph: in your netrhost.conf file add: newpass_god 1
This will allow IMMORTAL players to @newpassword #1 upon reboot.
